sentences.sContent: Yes, you can still find some photographers who dither on about grain in a photo, but they probably haven't dusted their specs in years.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes, you can still find some photographers who dither on about grain in a photo, but they probably haven't dusted their specs in years.
sentences.sCn: 嗯，你还能看到一些摄影师在为照片的颗粒度而担心得发抖，但是他们可能已经几年没有擦过眼镜了。

synos.tran: 发抖；递色；[电子][自]高频脉动
